definition: to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)

sentences.english: Only in the dark will ring inadvertently substituted.
sentences.chinese: 只是在不經意間暗將年輪偷換。

sentences.english: The original blade in early before they tick off pistol in last bullet.
sentences.chinese: 原來刀鋒早在之前便偷換掉手槍裏最後一顆子彈。

sentences.english: The thief interchanged the diamonds with some pieces of glass.
sentences.chinese: 那個竊賊將鑽石用一些碎玻璃偷換了。

sentences.english: Will the funds be spent on ballet lessons for his daughter or on a stolen vacation?
sentences.chinese: 是把錢用在女兒的芭蕾舞課程，抑或用於週末的偷換？
